title: Every Pot Has Its Kettle
itunes:title: Every Pot Has Its Kettle
description:
Kate inherits a bikini. Jacqueline praises Reddit. Elimination of caffeine, Andrew Johnson’s relaxation apps, and fresh flowers. Washing the brain. Power-washing the home. When you’re Half-you. The ocean as bucket. Jacqueline is “good at teaching.” Kate has Land Animal Primacy Issues. Children with past life memories.  

.

.

.

.

.

This episode was edited and engineered by C. Tweedie.
